name: RetrieveCompanyById
description:
Retrieve detailed company information using its ID.

Use this tool to get detailed information about a company by providing its ID or a unique property. You can specify which properties to retrieve.

parameters.name: company_identifier
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the company, such as its ID or a unique property name, used to retrieve its details.

parameters.name: company_properties_to_retrieve
parameters.description: List the specific company properties to retrieve, separated by commas. Ignored if properties are unavailable.

value_schema.description: A comma separated list of the properties to be returned in the response. If any of the specified properties are not present on the requested object(s), they will be ignored.

parameters.name: retrieve_properties_with_history
parameters.description: List of properties to return with their history of previous values. Ignored if properties aren't present.

value_schema.description: A comma separated list of the properties to be returned along with their history of previous values. If any of the specified properties are not present on the requested object(s), they will be ignored.

parameters.name: associated_object_types
parameters.description: A list of object types to retrieve associated IDs for. Ignores non-existent associations.

value_schema.description: A comma separated list of object types to retrieve associated IDs for. If any of the specified associations do not exist, they will be ignored.

parameters.name: unique_property_name
parameters.description: The name of a unique property to identify the company. Used instead of company ID.

value_schema.description: The name of a property whose values are unique for this object

parameters.name: return_only_archived
parameters.description: Set to true to return only archived results. If false, non-archived results will be returned.

value_schema.description: Whether to return only results that have been archived.
